text: @JGilliam_SEAL @realDonaldTrump I thought they were releasing inmates from jail over COVID-19 fears. Now they want to put you in jail? This makes absolutely no sense at all. Socialism is for the people, not the socialists. They are home at a party eating steak and sipping wine with their friends.
